## Standard interface

Standard Facet.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Standard 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [collapsible?](./search-ui-react.standard.collapsible.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether or not the filter is collapsible. Defaults to true. |
|  [customCssClasses?](./search-ui-react.standard.customcssclasses.md) | [StandardFacetsCssClasses](./search-ui-react.standardfacetscssclasses.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> CSS classes for customizing the component styling. |
|  [defaultExpanded?](./search-ui-react.standard.defaultexpanded.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> If the filter group is collapsible, whether or not it should start out expanded. Defaults to true. |
|  [facetId](./search-ui-react.standard.facetid.md) | string |  |
|  [showMoreLimit?](./search-ui-react.standard.showmorelimit.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Limit on the number of options to be displayed. Defaults to 10. |
|  [showOptionCounts?](./search-ui-react.standard.showoptioncounts.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether or not to show the option counts for each filter. Defaults to true. |
